## Script Info

**Project:** OECD National Evaluation Portal\
**Purpose:** (1) To explore 2023 Survey Responses on central web portal, (2) to present findings in the portal assessment table.



## Input Data Sets


::: {.cell}
::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
OECD.GOV.GIP,DSD_QDD_GOV_PE@DF_GOV_PE,+all.csv
```


:::

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
portal_assessment.csv
```


:::
:::




\newpage

## 2023 Survey Data Exploration

|Reference area           |Luxembourg, Denmark, Belgium, Sweden, Greece, I... |    31|
|FREQ                     |A                                                  |     1|

|MEASURE                  |Q_MC_INTROOBJ-IMPAC, Q_MC_RESPOMOF, Q_MC_RESPOP... |   412|
|Measure                  |Improve accountability and transparency of deci... |   312|
|TIME_PERIOD              |2023                                               |     1|
|Time period              |                                                   |     1|
|OBS_VALUE                |1, No, Yes, for some laws (<50%), Budget Proces... |   731|
|Observation value        |                                                   |     1|
|OBS_STATUS               |A                                                  |     1|
|Observation status       |Normal value                                       |     1|

## Portal Assessment Table Findings:

### Update on Central Web Portal Status


::: {.cell}
::: {.cell-output-display}
\begin{table}[!h]
\centering

\centering
\begin{tabular}[t]{>{\raggedright\arraybackslash}p{3.5cm}>{\raggedright\arraybackslash}p{3.5cm}>{\raggedright\arraybackslash}p{3.5cm}>{\raggedright\arraybackslash}p{3.5cm}}
\toprule
 &  &  & \\
\midrule
Australia & Austria & Belgium & Canada\\
Chile & Colombia & Costa Rica & Czechia\\
Denmark & Estonia & France & Greece\\
Hungary & Iceland & Ireland & Italy\\
Japan & Latvia & Lithuania & Luxembourg\\

Poland & Portugal & Spain & Sweden\\
Switzerland & United Kingdom & United States & Finland\\
